what.title: What is Sigmally?
what.desc: Sigmally is a fast‑paced, browser‑based agar.io‑style game hosted on private servers for more reliable performance. Dive in to gobble pellets, outmaneuver rivals, and grow your cell with satisfying physics and responsive controls. Compete solo or team up in dynamic matches, climb the global leaderboard, and join regular community events.

why.title: Why
why.desc: SigModz puts advanced tools and customization directly into your game. Create and fine‑tune macros for split feeds and rapid respawns, customize UI themes and layouts to match your style, and automate daily tasks like coin collection. With performance tweaks, multibox support, and intuitive in‑game controls, you’ll play cleaner, faster, and more strategically—whether you’re a casual gamer or a competitive pro.

sigmod.title: SigMod
sigmod.desc: SigMod transforms your Sigmally experience with a full in‑game mod menu that puts powerful tools at your fingertips. Set up programmable macros for rapid feeds and splits, customize every visual element with themes and layouts, and automate routine tasks like daily‑coin collection. Fine‑tune your HUD, keybindings, and chat settings to match your playstyle, all without leaving the game.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: SigFixes supercharges performance for smooth, consistent frame rates and minimal lag. Enjoy faster load times, crisper input response, and built‑in multibox controls so you can manage multiple accounts seamlessly. Tweak draw delay, cell opacity, camera zoom, and name scaling to eliminate stutter and keep your gameplay razor‑sharp.

questions.question: Are these scripts safe?
questions.answer: Yes—our mods are fully open‑source and transparent, and Tampermonkey is trusted by millions. No hidden code, no surprises.

questions.question: Do I need both mods?
questions.answer: Not required, but SigMod + SigFixes together deliver the best control and performance.

questions.question: Are they allowed in Sigmally?
questions.answer: Yes. Mods like SigMod and SigFixes are widely accepted by both the Sigmally community and its owner.

questions.question: Can I remove them anytime?
questions.answer: Yes—just disable or uninstall in your userscript manager.

questions.question: Will SigMod turn me into a pro gamer overnight?
questions.answer: I wish! SigMod is like giving your game a turbo boost—it smooths everything out, but you still have to handle the wheel. Your reflexes, strategy, and countless hours of practice are still on you.

WhySigMod.title: Why Choose SigMod?
WhySigMod.desc1: SigMod enhances the Sigmally client with intelligent automation, interface personalization, and full UI control. Apply macros, rearrange panels, remap keys, and refine visuals—all within a sleek in‑game dashboard. Change themes, bookmark names, and snap screenshots in a click.
WhySigMod.desc2: Coordinate with your squad using dynamic tagging: private chat channels, tactical pings, and live minimap markers. Track your match stats, manage friends, and tweak chat fonts, colors, and keybinds on the fly.
WhySigMod.performance: Want peak performance? Pair SigMod with

list.title: Macros & Automation
list.summary: Automate every move — keybinds, tricksplits & mouse macros
list.details: Bind keys for advanced actions like rapid feed, double/triple/quad splits, and tricksplits. Create mouse macros for left/right click behaviors. Configure split sequences with precise delay settings and feed speeds. Toggle settings like names, skins, or respawn with a key — all fully customizable.

list.title: Party & Tag System
list.summary: 3-letter tags, minimap tracking, pings & private party chat
list.details: Assign yourself a tag (up to 3 characters) to form private teams. Members are tracked on the minimap, listed in a party panel with name and score, and can send precise pings. The party chat allows for secure communication, isolated from public chat. You’ll also see who sent which ping by tag index.

list.title: Menu Customization
list.summary: Themes, fonts, layout, tabs, borders, and input styling
list.details: Personalize your UI with themes, rounded corners, background images, and custom input borders. Hide unwanted elements like Discord or language buttons. Customize tab order, spacing, shadows, and switch between preset layouts for a fully personalized experience.

list.title: Visual Game Settings
list.summary: Tweak map colors, opacity, cell styling and fonts
list.details: Adjust color and transparency of key game elements like the map, border, food, and cells. Replace in-game images such as viruses or map backgrounds. Choose different fonts, show/hide player names and skins, apply text outlines, and toggle visual overlays like grid and border.

list.title: Gallery & Screenshots
list.summary: Capture moments & manage your game gallery
list.details: Assign a keybind to instantly take a screenshot in-game. Browse your image collection in the Gallery tab. Each image includes timestamp, delete, and download options. Easily manage or clean your gallery in one place.

list.title: Name Tools & Color Effects
list.summary: Save names, use generators, gradients & symbols
list.details: Access nickname generators from popular sites (NickFinder, Tell.wtf). Save your favorite names for one-click copying. Create stylish names with special characters and design vibrant name colors using gradients and two-tone effects. Quick delete or reuse features built in.

list.title: Friends & Mod Profile
list.summary: Add users, chat privately & manage your mod identity
list.details: Add and chat with friends using username or Discord login. See online status, tag, server, and more. Use filters and search to find users. Customize your mod profile with avatar, bio, status, and color highlights. Accept/decline requests and toggle public visibility options.

list.title: Stats & Quick Access Panel
list.summary: Track gameplay and toggle key settings instantly
list.details: The Home tab shows stats like time played, top mass, and total deaths. The quick access panel lets you toggle Mass, Grid, Border, Jelly Physics, Auto-Respawn, Coin Claim and more — right from the menu without digging through settings.

list.title: Chat System Overhaul
list.summary: Custom mod chat with tabs, keybinds & full control
list.details: Switch between Party and Main chat via tabs. Messages update live using websocket interception. Use keybinds to send your location, toggle blur, enable time tags, or enable compact mode. Customize text, background, and full theme color including transparency.

list.question: What are the core features of SigMod?
list.answer: SigMod includes a fully customizable mod menu, powerful macros and automation tools, a party & tag system, live in-game stats, and a modern chat, name, and friend system — all integrated to enhance your Sigmally gameplay.

list.question: What customization options does SigMod offer?
list.answer: You can change themes, fonts, layout spacing, border radius, name colors (including gradients), UI opacity, menu visuals, game colors, and toggle dozens of visual settings. It also supports deathscreen tweaks, skin overrides, and background presets.

list.question: What is the tag system?
list.answer: The tag system lets you assign a 3-letter code to create a party with teammates. You can track each other on the minimap, chat in a private party channel, send pings, and view scores in a shared party panel with member names and tag indexes.

list.question: How does the friend system work?
list.answer: You can log in to create a mod profile and add other players as friends. View profiles, roles, online status, server info, and chat with them directly. Friend requests, search, settings, and profile customization (avatar, bio, status) are all included.

list.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
list.answer: Press the V key or click the gear icon in the top-right corner of the game to open the mod menu. It includes tabs for Macros, Themes, Gallery, Friends, and more.

list.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
list.answer: Yes. SigMod includes advanced keybinding tools for feeding, splitting, tricksplits, and more. You can also assign mouse macros, configure linesplit behavior, set rapid feed speed, and bind UI toggles like menu, names, or autorespawn.

list.question: Does SigMod affect game performance?
list.answer: SigMod adds many features but is optimized to stay lightweight. For better framerate or reduced lag, install SigFixes — which patches performance bottlenecks in the base Sigmally client.

list.question: Can I take and manage screenshots?
list.answer: Yes. Use a custom keybind to capture in-game screenshots instantly. View them by date in the Gallery tab, and download or delete them with one click.

Hero.sub: Enhance Sigmally's core with ultra-smooth performance, precise input, and advanced multibox control.

performance.title: Boosted Performance
performance.desc: Swaps the rendering engine for a faster one—smoother visuals, fewer spikes, and better overall stability.

multiboxing.title: Flawless Multiboxing
multiboxing.desc: One-tab control, outline tweaks, merge aids, and smart respawn tools—optimized for seamless multibox setups.

input.title: Precision Input
input.desc: Reduces input delay and improves control accuracy—especially powerful when using macros or split strategies.

WhySigFixes.title: Why Choose SigFixes?
WhySigFixes.desc1: SigFixes overhauls Sigmally’s rendering for smoother frames and sharper input. It removes common stutters, lowers delay, and keeps your gameplay steady—even under pressure.
WhySigFixes.desc2: Designed for serious players, it shines when multiboxing. With faster inputs, synced camera behavior, and visual tweaks that help you track and merge, it gives you full control.
WhySigFixes.combo: ? Pair both for the ultimate experience.

list.title: Performance
list.summary: Replaces the canvas with high-speed WebGL rendering
list.details: SigFixes eliminates lag spikes by replacing the game's canvas with a fully optimized WebGL renderer. This allows smoother gameplay, better framerates, and consistent performance across all devices—even when multiboxing or recording.

list.title: Accurate Input
list.summary: Less delay between your input and movement
list.details: Experience real-time response when moving, feeding, or splitting. SigFixes reduces latency and improves precision for all mouse and keyboard actions. Every move feels sharper and more controlled, especially in high-speed fights.

list.title: Advanced Multiboxing
list.summary: One-tab control, vision merging, respawn handling
list.details: Control multiple instances from a single tab. Choose your vision merge method, customize outlines, colors, and respawn logic. Enable flawless merging, block cluster respawns, and optimize the setup for 2+ tabs with ease.

list.title: Draw Settings
list.summary: Tweak draw delay, cell outlines, camera & zoom
list.details: Set custom draw delay to balance visuals vs performance. Toggle cell outlines, set your skin URL, choose camera behavior (Natural, Instant), and fine-tune zoom speed and auto-zoom toggle for a responsive experience.

list.title: Visual Tools
list.summary: Opacity, glow, skins, jelly physics and grid lines
list.details: Adjust the visibility and behavior of your cells, skins, pellets, or glow. Enable/disable jelly physics and overlays like lines between cells and cursor. Highlight unsplittable cells with custom colors and opacity.

list.title: Theme Customization
list.summary: Pick your theme color and control UI visuals
list.details: Select your own theme color and apply it across the mod. Make the UI match your personal style, from color accents to visual effects like rainbow borders and map backgrounds.

list.title: Game Behavior Tweaks
list.summary: Pushsplit delay, XP score split, aftersplit movement
list.details: Configure how the game behaves after splits, including when movement starts, how pushsplits behave, and how XP and score are shown. These fine-tuned options make competitive movement easier to master.

list.title: Camera Control
list.details: Adjust the way your camera moves: instantly, naturally, or smoothly. Control the spawn camera's behavior, zoom interpolation, and speed to match your preference or setup.

list.title: Text Rendering
list.summary: Font size, weight, outline and clan display
list.details: Edit the name/mass scale, toggle bold text, apply outlines, and hide or show clans. Perfect for minimal setups or high visibility during chaotic moments.

list.question: What is SigFixes?
list.answer: SigFixes is a performance patch for the Sigmally client. It swaps the rendering engine for a WebGL canvas, making gameplay smoother, faster, and more responsive—especially useful for multiboxing and competitive play.

list.question: Does SigFixes change how the game looks?
list.answer: By default, it looks just like the original client. But for advanced users, it adds options like skin overrides, cell opacity adjustments, text scaling, glow effects, and outlines for unsplittable cells.

list.question: Can I use SigFixes with SigMod?
list.answer: Absolutely. SigFixes works seamlessly alongside SigMod, combining advanced features with improved performance and lower lag.

list.question: Will SigFixes help with multiboxing?
list.answer: Yes. It offers features like One-tab control, vision merging options, spawn blocking, and tab outlines—all designed to reduce input delay and improve sync between tabs.

list.question: How do I install SigFixes?
list.answer: First, install Tampermonkey or Violentmonkey (only one). Then enable Developer Mode in your browser’s extensions page. Finally, install the SigFixes userscript from the official source and restart your browser.

list.question: What camera settings can I adjust?
list.answer: You can switch between Default and Natural camera styles, set movement to Instant or Smooth, control zoom speed, and enable Auto-zoom and camera tracking on spawn.

list.question: What is the 'draw delay' setting?
list.answer: Draw delay controls how often the game canvas refreshes. Higher values make animations smoother but may lower performance; lower values boost performance but can make visuals less fluid. You can customize it to your preference.

list.question: Can I customize text and name display?
list.answer: Yes. You can adjust name and mass scaling, toggle bold fonts, set opacity levels, show or hide clan tags, and tweak outline thickness for better visibility or a cleaner UI.

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions

installMods.question: How do I install the mods?
installMods.answer: Getting started is simple! Just follow our detailed or quick <link>installation guide</link>, and you’ll be playing with the mods in no time.

modsNotWorking.question: I installed the mods but they aren’t working. What now?
modsNotWorking.answer: Most issues happen because 'Allow User Scripts' isn’t enabled in Tampermonkey on Chrome or Brave, or Developer Mode isn’t enabled on Edge or Opera. For exact instructions, check the <link>installation guide</link>. Still stuck? Open a ticket on our Discord—we’ll help you out.

safe.question: Are Tampermonkey and these userscripts safe?
safe.answer: Yes, absolutely. Tampermonkey is a trusted extension used by millions worldwide, and our userscripts only enhance your game experience without any hidden tricks. Plus, you can read reviews on the script pages. Use with confidence.

sigmodAndSigfixes.question: Do I need both SigMod and SigFixes?
sigmodAndSigfixes.answer: No, but using both together gives you the best performance and customization. They’re designed to complement each other perfectly.

multibox.question: How do I multibox?
multibox.answer: Install SigFixes to run multiple game instances smoothly in one browser tab and control them all at once. For a step-by-step setup, check out the guide here.

uninstallMods.question: Can I uninstall the mods anytime?
uninstallMods.answer: Yes, just disable or remove them from your userscript manager whenever you want.

coreFeatures.question: What are SigMod’s core features?
coreFeatures.answer: SigMod offers powerful customization, macros, automation, and an advanced tag system to improve your Sigmally gameplay.

customization.question: What customization options does SigMod provide?
customization.answer: You can change hotkeys, UI themes, game colors, play timers, fonts, and name settings to fit your style.

tagSystem.question: What is the tag system?
tagSystem.answer: It’s a system to manage party tags and track teammates easily. It integrates with the minimap and chat, shows team scores, and displays teammate info for better coordination.

friendSystem.question: How does the friend system work?
friendSystem.answer: Add, manage, and track friends in-game to stay connected and coordinate play.

openMenu.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
openMenu.answer: Click the gear icon in the game UI or press the “V” key on your keyboard to open the mod menu.

customHotkeys.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
customHotkeys.answer: Definitely! SigMod lets you fully customize hotkeys and mouse macros to match your playstyle and boost your efficiency.

performance.question: Does SigMod impact game performance?
performance.answer: SigMod is lightweight and focuses on customization rather than boosting performance. For better FPS and smoother gameplay, use SigFixes.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes Specific
sigfixes.note: Each setting has a ? icon for detailed explanations—just click them!

improvements.question: What does SigFixes improve?
improvements.answer: SigFixes enhances frame rates, reduces lag spikes, enables smooth multiboxing, and offers customization like draw delay, opacity, and name scaling.

multibox.question: How does SigFixes help with multiboxing?
multibox.answer: It lets you run multiple game instances in one browser tab, making multiboxing smoother and easier.

fps.question: Will SigFixes improve my FPS?
fps.answer: Yes, it significantly boosts FPS by optimizing rendering and cutting down lag spikes.

compatibility.question: Is SigFixes compatible with SigMod?
compatibility.answer: Yes, they’re fully compatible and designed to work together for the best experience.

config.question: How do I configure draw delay and other settings?
config.answer: Adjust these in the SigFixes mod menu. Look for the “?” icons next to each option for detailed info.

tldr.title: What is SigModz?
tldr.text: SigModz is a community-driven project focused on enhancing the Sigmally experience through powerful mods like SigMod and SigFixes.

story.title: Background
story.intro: SigModz brings together players and developers who aim to improve Sigmally with advanced features and high-quality tools.
story.sigmodStart: It started with SigMod — a userscript mod originally based on RingZer0’s open-source version. His work laid the groundwork for modern modding in Sigmally.
story.sigmod: SigMod introduced further customization, UI improvements, macros, and community-requested features — making it one of the most popular client-side mods for Sigmally.
story.sigfixes: Later, SigFixes by yx pushed the limits further: a complete WebGL renderer, multiboxing support, improved input handling, and performance upgrades — all optimized for serious players.
story.community: Both mods are widely accepted by the Sigmally community and supported by the game’s owner. SigModz continues to evolve with input from players and developers alike.
story.thanks: Special thanks to RingZer0 for the original base, and to yx for pushing the technical boundaries. The community’s support is what keeps SigModz alive and growing.
